attributes.action: The Govement to stop all Council Tax payments untill Covid 19 is over .
attributes.additional_details: To directly help with household finances. With imediate effect.
attributes.background:
To legislate that councils can not charge or take action for non payment of council tax. 

That saving most house hold approx 160 a month.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
